raw_data.raw_string: From 1 March 2016, Adviser to the King Faisal Center for Research and Islamic Studies, a think tank/NGO. Address: P.O. Box 51049, Riyadh 11543, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The role will involve providing advice to the centre on its work on international relations covering Europe and the Middle East, for which I will be paid £2,000 per month until further notice. Hours: 10 hrs per month. (Registered 24 February 2016)

21  December 2017, received £1,400 from Princess Production Ltd, Whiteleys Centre, 151 Queensway, London W2 4YN, for appearing on 'The Wright Stuff' as a panellist between 11 and 15 September 2017. Hours: 20 hrs (4 hrs a day including travel and preparation). (Registered 16 January 2018)
